metadata.synopsis: Recognising Lathander, the god of Dawn on a statue.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -47; 52; -134 in CRE_Main_A and click the plaque at the base of the lathander statue. - Wait of the AD to finish. - Succeed on the religion check.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like Lathander, god of the dawning sun.
